mapper.sql: id, ip, remark, mac, print_name, cretae_time, creator, update_time, updator, del_time, deletor, is_delete
mapper.select:
select
from config WHERE 1=1
AND print_name like CONCAT('%',#{printName},'%')
AND ip like CONCAT('%',#{ip},'%')
AND mac like CONCAT('%',#{mac},'%')
select COUNT(1) from config where print_name = #{printName}
select COUNT(1) from config where ip = #{ip}
mapper.insert:
insert into config
id,
ip,
remark,
mac,
print_name,
cretae_time,
creator,
update_time,
updator,
del_time,
deletor,
is_delete,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{ip,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{printName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cretaeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{deletor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT},
mapper.update:
update config
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mac = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
print_name = #{printName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cretae_time = #{cretaeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_time = #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deletor = #{deletor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update config set ip = #{ip,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mac = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, print_name = #{printName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cretae_time = #{cretaeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_time = #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deletor = #{deletor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
